description: Get a media attachment, before it is attached to a status and posted, but after it is accepted for processing. Use this method to check that the full-sized media has finished processing.

request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the MediaAttachment in the database.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: REQUIRED Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.
